name: Timension
description: Timension is a puzzle game in which players are able to reverse time to 15 seconds ago to finish the mission impossible.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7， Windows 10 Processor: Not limited Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX660Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7， Windows 10 Processor: Not limited Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GFORCE GTX750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
